name: Gump Jang
description:
Gump Jang is a 2d platformer, in which the player must pass through a majority of levels containing obstacles

featuring:

- Different sets of traps

- Jump buffering and coyote jump

Controls

Keyboard:

   A , D - moving left or right

   S - crouch or realese form hanging position

   Space - Jump

   Left mouse button - Attack ( Kick )

   R -  Restart ( when dead )

   Esc  -  pause
